<script src="/vendor/popper/js/popper.min.js"></script>
<script src="/vendor/bootstrap/js/bootstrap.bundle.js"></script>
<script src="/vendor/bootstrap/js/bootstrap.js"></script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function (){

    	if( $.fn.jquery > "3.0.0" )
    	{
			$.fn.size = function (){ console.log(this); return this.length; };
		}

		jQuery.fn.sleep = function (ms) {
			 return new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, ms));
		}

		$('#messageDropdown').dropdown();
		$('#profileDropdown').dropdown();
		$('#loginSignupDropdown').dropdown();

        $("ul.navbar-nav").on("mouseover",'li.dropdown',function() {
			if( $(this).children('a.dropdown-toggle').length == 0 && !$(this).hasClass("show") )
			{
				$(this).children('.dropdown-toggle').dropdown('toggle');
			}
        });

        $("ul.navbar-nav").on("mouseout",'li.dropdown',function() {
			if( $(this).children('a.dropdown-toggle').length == 0 && $(this).hasClass("show") )
			{
				$(this).children('.dropdown-toggle').dropdown('toggle');
			}
        });

        $(".js-top-menu-sitebuilder--list").on('click',function() {
        	$(this).parent().find('.dropdown-toggle').dropdown('toggle');
        });
    });
</script>

<link rel="stylesheet" href="/vendor/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.css">

		<link rel="stylesheet" href="/vendor/bootstrap/css/prefixed/bootstrap.css">
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="/vendor/bootstrap/css/prefixed/bootstrap-grid.css">
		<link rel="stylesheet" href="/vendor/bootstrap/css/prefixed/bootstrap-reboot.css">

		<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Squada+One" rel="stylesheet">

		{vb:cssExtra css_bootstrap_navbar.css}
		{vb:cssExtra css_bootstrap_navbar_custom.css}

phrasetype.name: Style Tools
phrasetype.phrase:
This is the base bootstrap class for the Navigation.
Options are:
navbar-light navbar-dark
You can include Bootstrap Color Mixins as well such as bg-primary. Place these side-by-side:
navbar-dark bg-primary
Controls the font family, size, and style for the navigation bar.
Controls text transformation for the text in the navigation bar.
Controls the text color for the navigation bar.
Controls the color for links in the navigation bar.
Controls the text color for links in the navigation bar, when the mouse is over them.
Controls the text color for links in the navigation bar, when it is currently selected.
Controls the background color and image for the navigation bar.
Controls the gradient for the navigation bar item
Controls the background color and image for the navigation bar item, when it is currently selected.
Controls the gradient for the navigation bar item, when it is currently selected.
Controls the background color and image for the navigation bar item, when the mouse is over it.
Controls the gradient for the navigation bar item, when the mouse is over them.
Controls the padding for the navigation bar.
Controls the background color and image for the navigation bar dropdown menu.
Controls the background color gradient for the navigation bar dropdown menu.
Controls the background color and image for the navigation bar dropdown menu, when it is currently selected.
Controls the background color gradient for the navigation bar dropdown menu, when it is currently selected.
Controls the background color and image for the navigation bar dropdown menu, when the mouse is over it.
Controls the background color gradient for the navigation bar dropdown menu, when the mouse is over it.
Controls the font family, size, and style for the navigation bar dropdown menu.
Controls the text color for the navigation bar dropdown menu.
Controls text transformation for the text in the navigation bar dropdown menu.
Controls the color for links in the navigation bar dropdown menu.
Controls the color for links in the navigation bar dropdown menu, when the mouse is over it.
Controls the color for links in the navigation bar dropdown menu, when it is currently selected.
